generated.css: .head_box_quiz{margin-top:1rem}.head_box_quiz .title{color:var(--primary-color);text-align:center}.head_box_quiz .gameplay{color:var(--main-ft-color);opacity:.6;text-align:center;margin:.2rem auto}.head_box_quiz .instruct{color:var(--primary-color);text-align:center;font-size:1rem;margin-top:.5rem}.content_box_quiz{background-color:var(--secondary-color);padding:0 1rem;display:grid;grid-template-areas:"assets intitules" "assets reponses";grid-column-gap:1rem;justify-content:center;align-items:stretch}.intitules{grid-area:intitules;display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;justify-content:flex-end;align-items:center;font-weight:700;font-size:1rem}.intitules p{padding:0 1rem}.assets{grid-area:assets;grid-row:1/3;padding:0 2rem;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.assets img,.assets video{display:block;height:100%;max-height:500px;margin:auto}.assets video{cursor:pointer}.reponses{grid-area:reponses;display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;justify-content:flex-start;align-items:stretch;margin-bottom:1rem}.reponses.dragDrop_rep{align-items:center}.reponses.dragDrop_rep input.droparea{padding:.5em;border-radius:.3em;cursor:default;caret-color:#fff}.reponses.dragDrop_rep div#draggable_box{margin-top:2rem;display:flex;flex-flow:row;justify-content:space-around;align-items:center;align-content:center}.reponses.dragDrop_rep span.draggable_span{//display:inline-block;border:1px solid gray;padding:.5rem;margin:.8em;border-radius:.4em;cursor:grab}input[name=valid]{font-family:Asap_bold;//font-weight:bold;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:.1rem;padding:.75rem 2.5rem;margin:0 auto;border-radius:1.25rem/50%;font-size:1rem;background-color:var(--primary-color);color:var(--main-bg-color);cursor:pointer;border:1px solid var(--main-bg-color)}input[name=valid]:hover{background-color:var(--secondary-color);color:var(--primary-color);border:1px solid var(--primary-color)}
